title: Warm Gun will be live streamed - tune in this Friday
content: Our first 500 Startups event, Warm Gun, is only a couple days away! For folks who can't make it in person, we'll be live streaming the event. So you can check out all the great sessions from wherever you are. The URL to bookmark: http://bit.ly/warmgunlivestream Be sure to follow @warmgundesign for all the latest Warm Gun info, including day-of live tweeting and presenters' SlideShare presentations! And our event hash tags will be #warmgun and #warmgundesign.
